protein.specific_function: Binds to all human somatostatin receptor (SSTR) subtypes. It also inhibits cAMP production induced by forskolin through SSTRs

reference.reference_text: Fukusumi S, Kitada C, Takekawa S, Kizawa H, Sakamoto J, Miyamoto M, Hinuma S, Kitano K, Fujino M: Identification and characterization of a novel human cortistatin-like peptide. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 1997 Mar 6;232(1):157-63.
